title: 15 Weekender Bags Worth Booking a Vacation For
description: We proudly consider ourselves seasoned travelers and smart packers, well-versed in accumulating air miles and expertly fitting all our essentials into a compact carry-on. Our key to streamlined packing? A trusty weekender bag. This versatile piece of luggage outshines traditional purses, holding everything from favorite makeup products to footwear, electronic devices, and even our go-to designer handbag. Over the years, we've tested a handful of these large carryalls, and we definitely have our favorites. If you've landed here because you're tired of traveling around with that old oversize tote bag, now is the time to invest in a new, useful one you'll actually enjoy carrying. Ahead, we curated a list of our top picks with a great variety of features. On the hunt for a stylish weekender bag with a dedicated shoe compartment? The social media-famous Béis Weekender Bag is an editor favorite that has you covered. We also found ones that can slide on top of your luggage and stay secure, as well as wear- and weatherproof options. Keep scrolling to shop these picks and more of our favorite weekender bags. Related: 21 Genius Amazon Products For Pro Travelers
author: Marisa Petrarca
excerpt: We rounded up the best weekender bags for your next adventure.
text: Getty Images | Edward BerthelotGetty Images | Edward BerthelotWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.We proudly consider ourselves seasoned travelers and smart packers, well-versed in accumulating air miles and expertly fitting all our essentials into a compact carry-on. Our key to streamlined packing? A trusty weekender bag. This versatile piece of luggage outshines traditional purses, holding everything from favorite makeup products to footwear, electronic devices, and even our go-to designer handbag. Over the years, we've tested a handful of these large carryalls, and we definitely have our favorites.If you've landed here because you're tired of traveling around with that old oversize tote bag, now is the time to invest in a new, useful one you'll actually enjoy carrying. Ahead, we curated a list of our top picks with a great variety of features. On the hunt for a stylish weekender bag with a dedicated shoe compartment? The social media-famous Béis Weekender Bag is an editor favorite that has you covered. We also found ones that can slide on top of your luggage and stay secure, as well as wear- and weatherproof options. Keep scrolling to shop these picks and more of our favorite weekender bags.amazon.comBest Versatile Weekender BagFit & Fresh, All the Things Women's Weekender Bag ($30) You're looking at one of Amazon's most well-loved weekenders. True to its name, its oversize design accommodates all (!) of your belongings, featuring long and sturdy straps capable of supporting its weighty contents. Shoppers love it for quick getaways, but others have repurposed it as a hospital birth bag, a beach companion, a laundry tote, and more.amazon.comBest Sporty Weekender BagAdidas Unisex Defender 4 Small Duffel Bag ($32, originally $40) This Adidas weekender might catch your eye if you have a sporty sense of style. Amazon shoppers recommend it for dual use as a gym bag and a weekender, mainly for people who pack light since it's on the smaller side. It has one main interior compartment with a top and side zipper for easy access to your belongings and a padded removable shoulder strap for easy hauling.amazon.comBest Weekender Bag on AmazonBAGSMART Weekender ($36, originally $38) If you're new to Bagsmart, it's one of Amazon's top travel accessory brands, loved for its sleek, modern designs, budget-friendly prices (without skimping on style), and ultra-functional details. Take this one, for example: it features a chic quilted design, a removable shoulder strap, a dedicated water bottle pocket, an anti-theft zipper, and an expansion strap — plus plenty more thoughtful touches where that came from. And when you're not using it as a weekender, it doubles as a gym bag, complete with a built-in yoga mat buckle.amazon.comBest Leopard Print Weekender BagIBFUN Weekender Bag ($37, originally $42) Leopard print is having a major moment, so naturally we had to spotlight this bestselling Amazon weekender. It's packed with features found in pricier options on our list: a waterproof shoe compartment, trolley sleeve, and adjustable shoulder strap, but all at a fraction of the price.amazon.comBest Faux-Leather Weekender BagSeyfocnia Leather Travel Bag with Shoe Pouch ($40) Thousands of shoppers love this weekender bag. It's crafted from faux leather but looks more expensive, despite its under-$50 price tag. Its appeal goes beyond aesthetics, though; it's highly functional, featuring a trolley sleeve that effortlessly slips onto the back of your luggage, a zippered shoe compartment for separating footwear, and an adjustable cushioned shoulder strap for comfortable carrying. It comes in different colors and materials to suit different tastes, including quilted fabric options and canvas.amazon.comBest Weekender Garment BagModoker Women Convertible Leather Garment Bag ($60) This might look like just another pretty weekender bag from the outside, but the inside will surprise you. It opens to a built-in garment bag, perfect for keeping your favorite outfits wrinkle-free for a weekend getaway. It has toiletry pockets and dedicated left and right compartments for shoes and accessories, along with a spacious main interior. One five-star Amazon reviewer said it all: "I used it for a recent weekend trip, and my dresses stayed in great shape, with no need to iron upon arrival."amazon.comBest Canvas Weekender BagSamsonite Virtuosa Weekender Duffel Overnight Bag ($90, originally $100) This Samsonite weekender bag looks way more expensive than it is, right? It keeps its shape even when empty, with faux leather handles that contrast beautifully against the canvas fabric. Reviews are rolling in, and people are loving it. One shopper shared, "Plain and simple but quality all the way. I love this bag. I liked both colors but went with the Navy. With the brown, leather-look straps, it's a classic look."PS Photography | Anvita ReddyBest Weekender Bag With Shoe CompartmentBéis 'The Weekender' Bag ($108) The Béis The Weekender Bag has two main compartments: a flexible tote-like section on the top and a sturdier, PVC-bound bottom compartment meant for shoes and other heavy-duty items. The bag also has an exterior pocket that doubles as a trolley sleeve, so you can easily secure this bag onto a carry-on suitcase. The bag is also equipped with metal feet, top handles, and a crossbody strap. It's an editor-favorite weekender bag for its versatility. It's less bulky than a traditional carry-on suitcase but can fit as much and keep things organized. Learn more via our Béis 'The Weekender' Bag review.Editor Quote: "I really enjoyed using the Béis Weekender Bag for my short trip to Florida. It fit everything my dad and I needed for the weekend, plus an extra outfit each. But the best part of this bag is its versatility. It's ideal for a quick weekend trip on its own, but it's also great as carry-on luggage for a longer trip, whether you're flying or driving." — Anvita Reddy, assistant editor, Shoppingamazon.comBest Cotton Weekender BagVera Bradley Women's Cotton Weekender Travel Bag ($135) Ready for the Vera Bradley revival? Whether you're a "yes" or a "no," it's happening, and this weekender stands out as one of the brand's unparalleled top sellers. It has an overwhelming amount of five-star ratings on Amazon. Customers laud its long shoulder strap, durable recycled cotton fabric, and spacious silhouette. Plus, it comes in many patterns, so you can select the one that best complements your style.shop.lululemon.comBest Modern Weekender BagLululemon Go Getter Bag 2.0 ($158) You're surely familiar with Lululemon — no intro needed. The minimalist design of this weekender is what truly sets it apart, making it as city-ready as it is adventure-approved. It has water-repellent, durable, and lightweight fabric that can handle just about anything and its standout details include padded handles for extra comfort, a hidden trolley strap, a quick-access phone pocket, and a dedicated water bottle holder. dagnedover.comBest Weekender Bag With Useful PocketsDagne Dover Medium Landon Carryall ($185) The popular Dagne Dover Medium Landon Carryall is one of our all-time favorites. Its soft and unstructured design is crafted from neoprene (yes, the primary material in wetsuits) that stretches to fit all your belongings and effortlessly squishes underneath a seat. Plus, it has many functional pockets and accessories, including a designated place for your laptop and an open zip top that makes it easy to see all your items. Bonus: it comes with a shoe bag and a crossbody strap.caraasport.comBest Puffer Weekender BagCaraa Nimbus Tote ($250) When it comes to comfort, the Caraa Nimbus Tote is hard to beat. It can be carried on your shoulder or in a crossbody style, and the cool design looks and feels like a puffy cloud, making it cozy to hold. We love the two side pockets on the outside, which are great for stashing your phone and water bottle. It also doubles as a great gym bag. nordstrom.comBest Lightweight Weekender BagMZ Wallace Medium Metro Tote ($275) If you're looking for a lightweight option, you can't go wrong with a nylon choice. This bestselling MZ Wallace Medium Metro Tote is easy to carry and has lots of great pockets. It can fit a ton and is easy to move around. Plus, its light fabric is weatherproof and easy to dry off. It comes with a crossbody strap and in a number of colors and sizes.nordstrom.comBest Expandable Weekender BagLongchamp Le Pliage Expandable Travel Bag ($285) The bestselling Longchamp Le Pliage Expandable Travel Bag is a smart option for bringing on your travels because it expands, making it a good place to store items you purchased on your travels, saving you from cramming them into your suitcase. Plus, it folds up to a pocket size, making it easy to store away when it's not in use.cuyana.comBest Weekender Bag For OrganizationCuyana Triple Zipper Weekender Bag ($298) The Cuyana Triple Zipper Weekender Bag is perfect for those who need to keep things compartmentalized. It's equipped with three zippered compartments that are ideal for those who like to organize by day, item, or person. One of the compartments has three large slip pockets that are great for storing shoes, hair tools, and other necessities. The bag even has a trolley sleeve. Carry this in your hand, over your shoulder, or as a crossbody.-Marisa Petrarca (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has over seven years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. She was previously the senior beauty editor at Grazia USA and the style and beauty editor at Us Weekly. Now freelancing, her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, Marie Claire, and more. When she's not working on a story, you can probably find her testing the latest makeup, skin-care, or hair launches. Marisa lives in Saint Paul, MN, with her husband and their corgi, Cooper.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

We proudly consider ourselves seasoned travelers and smart packers, well-versed in accumulating air miles and expertly fitting all our essentials into a compact carry-on. Our key to streamlined packing? A trusty weekender bag. This versatile piece of luggage outshines traditional purses, holding everything from favorite makeup products to footwear, electronic devices, and even our go-to designer handbag. Over the years, we've tested a handful of these large carryalls, and we definitely have our favorites.

If you've landed here because you're tired of traveling around with that old oversize tote bag, now is the time to invest in a new, useful one you'll actually enjoy carrying. Ahead, we curated a list of our top picks with a great variety of features. On the hunt for a stylish weekender bag with a dedicated shoe compartment? The social media-famous Béis Weekender Bag is an editor favorite that has you covered. We also found ones that can slide on top of your luggage and stay secure, as well as wear- and weatherproof options. Keep scrolling to shop these picks and more of our favorite weekender bags.

Best Versatile Weekender Bag

Fit & Fresh, All the Things Women's Weekender Bag ($30)

You're looking at one of Amazon's most well-loved weekenders. True to its name, its oversize design accommodates all (!) of your belongings, featuring long and sturdy straps capable of supporting its weighty contents. Shoppers love it for quick getaways, but others have repurposed it as a hospital birth bag, a beach companion, a laundry tote, and more.

Best Sporty Weekender Bag

Adidas Unisex Defender 4 Small Duffel Bag ($32, originally $40)

This Adidas weekender might catch your eye if you have a sporty sense of style. Amazon shoppers recommend it for dual use as a gym bag and a weekender, mainly for people who pack light since it's on the smaller side. It has one main interior compartment with a top and side zipper for easy access to your belongings and a padded removable shoulder strap for easy hauling.

Best Weekender Bag on Amazon

BAGSMART Weekender ($36, originally $38)

If you're new to Bagsmart, it's one of Amazon's top travel accessory brands, loved for its sleek, modern designs, budget-friendly prices (without skimping on style), and ultra-functional details. Take this one, for example: it features a chic quilted design, a removable shoulder strap, a dedicated water bottle pocket, an anti-theft zipper, and an expansion strap — plus plenty more thoughtful touches where that came from. And when you're not using it as a weekender, it doubles as a gym bag, complete with a built-in yoga mat buckle.

Best Leopard Print Weekender Bag

IBFUN Weekender Bag ($37, originally $42)

Leopard print is having a major moment, so naturally we had to spotlight this bestselling Amazon weekender. It's packed with features found in pricier options on our list: a waterproof shoe compartment, trolley sleeve, and adjustable shoulder strap, but all at a fraction of the price.

Best Faux-Leather Weekender Bag

Seyfocnia Leather Travel Bag with Shoe Pouch ($40)

Thousands of shoppers love this weekender bag. It's crafted from faux leather but looks more expensive, despite its under-$50 price tag. Its appeal goes beyond aesthetics, though; it's highly functional, featuring a trolley sleeve that effortlessly slips onto the back of your luggage, a zippered shoe compartment for separating footwear, and an adjustable cushioned shoulder strap for comfortable carrying. It comes in different colors and materials to suit different tastes, including quilted fabric options and canvas.

Best Weekender Garment Bag

Modoker Women Convertible Leather Garment Bag ($60)

This might look like just another pretty weekender bag from the outside, but the inside will surprise you. It opens to a built-in garment bag, perfect for keeping your favorite outfits wrinkle-free for a weekend getaway. It has toiletry pockets and dedicated left and right compartments for shoes and accessories, along with a spacious main interior. One five-star Amazon reviewer said it all: "I used it for a recent weekend trip, and my dresses stayed in great shape, with no need to iron upon arrival."

Best Canvas Weekender Bag

Samsonite Virtuosa Weekender Duffel Overnight Bag ($90, originally $100)

This Samsonite weekender bag looks way more expensive than it is, right? It keeps its shape even when empty, with faux leather handles that contrast beautifully against the canvas fabric. Reviews are rolling in, and people are loving it. One shopper shared, "Plain and simple but quality all the way. I love this bag. I liked both colors but went with the Navy. With the brown, leather-look straps, it's a classic look."

Best Weekender Bag With Shoe Compartment

Béis 'The Weekender' Bag ($108)

The Béis The Weekender Bag has two main compartments: a flexible tote-like section on the top and a sturdier, PVC-bound bottom compartment meant for shoes and other heavy-duty items. The bag also has an exterior pocket that doubles as a trolley sleeve, so you can easily secure this bag onto a carry-on suitcase. The bag is also equipped with metal feet, top handles, and a crossbody strap. It's an editor-favorite weekender bag for its versatility. It's less bulky than a traditional carry-on suitcase but can fit as much and keep things organized. Learn more via our Béis 'The Weekender' Bag review.

Editor Quote: "I really enjoyed using the Béis Weekender Bag for my short trip to Florida. It fit everything my dad and I needed for the weekend, plus an extra outfit each. But the best part of this bag is its versatility. It's ideal for a quick weekend trip on its own, but it's also great as carry-on luggage for a longer trip, whether you're flying or driving." — Anvita Reddy, assistant editor, Shopping

Best Cotton Weekender Bag

Vera Bradley Women's Cotton Weekender Travel Bag ($135)

Ready for the Vera Bradley revival? Whether you're a "yes" or a "no," it's happening, and this weekender stands out as one of the brand's unparalleled top sellers. It has an overwhelming amount of five-star ratings on Amazon. Customers laud its long shoulder strap, durable recycled cotton fabric, and spacious silhouette. Plus, it comes in many patterns, so you can select the one that best complements your style.

Best Modern Weekender Bag

Lululemon Go Getter Bag 2.0 ($158)

You're surely familiar with Lululemon — no intro needed. The minimalist design of this weekender is what truly sets it apart, making it as city-ready as it is adventure-approved. It has water-repellent, durable, and lightweight fabric that can handle just about anything and its standout details include padded handles for extra comfort, a hidden trolley strap, a quick-access phone pocket, and a dedicated water bottle holder.

Best Weekender Bag With Useful Pockets

Dagne Dover Medium Landon Carryall ($185)

The popular Dagne Dover Medium Landon Carryall is one of our all-time favorites. Its soft and unstructured design is crafted from neoprene (yes, the primary material in wetsuits) that stretches to fit all your belongings and effortlessly squishes underneath a seat. Plus, it has many functional pockets and accessories, including a designated place for your laptop and an open zip top that makes it easy to see all your items. Bonus: it comes with a shoe bag and a crossbody strap.

Best Puffer Weekender Bag

Caraa Nimbus Tote ($250)

When it comes to comfort, the Caraa Nimbus Tote is hard to beat. It can be carried on your shoulder or in a crossbody style, and the cool design looks and feels like a puffy cloud, making it cozy to hold. We love the two side pockets on the outside, which are great for stashing your phone and water bottle. It also doubles as a great gym bag.

Best Lightweight Weekender Bag

MZ Wallace Medium Metro Tote ($275)

If you're looking for a lightweight option, you can't go wrong with a nylon choice. This bestselling MZ Wallace Medium Metro Tote is easy to carry and has lots of great pockets. It can fit a ton and is easy to move around. Plus, its light fabric is weatherproof and easy to dry off. It comes with a crossbody strap and in a number of colors and sizes.

Best Expandable Weekender Bag

Longchamp Le Pliage Expandable Travel Bag ($285)

The bestselling Longchamp Le Pliage Expandable Travel Bag is a smart option for bringing on your travels because it expands, making it a good place to store items you purchased on your travels, saving you from cramming them into your suitcase. Plus, it folds up to a pocket size, making it easy to store away when it's not in use.

Best Weekender Bag For Organization

Cuyana Triple Zipper Weekender Bag ($298)

The Cuyana Triple Zipper Weekender Bag is perfect for those who need to keep things compartmentalized. It's equipped with three zippered compartments that are ideal for those who like to organize by day, item, or person. One of the compartments has three large slip pockets that are great for storing shoes, hair tools, and other necessities. The bag even has a trolley sleeve. Carry this in your hand, over your shoulder, or as a crossbody.

Marisa Petrarca (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has over seven years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. She was previously the senior beauty editor at Grazia USA and the style and beauty editor at Us Weekly. Now freelancing, her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, Marie Claire, and more. When she's not working on a story, you can probably find her testing the latest makeup, skin-care, or hair launches. Marisa lives in Saint Paul, MN, with her husband and their corgi, Cooper.
